info.title: BoostGPT API
info.description: API for managing AI agents with memory capabilities

post.description: Create a new memory source for an agent

get.description: Fetch a specific memory source by ID
Fetch a paginated list of all memory sources for an agent

post.description: Search through an agent's memory using keywords and filters

get.description: Fetch a specific agent by ID
Fetch a paginated list of all agents in a project

post.description: Delete all memory sources associated with an agent

get.description: Get all tools configured for an agent

post.description: Create a new tool configuration for an agent

put.description: Configure multiple tool settings at once (bulk toggle)

post.description: Test connection to a tool server
Send a message to an agent and receive a response

get.description: Fetch messages from a specific chat conversation
Fetch a paginated list of all chat conversations for an agent

post.description: Execute a tool within a chat session (single or batch execution)

put.description: Upvote or downvote a chat message

get.description: Get the vote status for a specific chat message
Fetch a paginated list of all subscribers/leads
Get all vote statistics for an agent
Get summary statistics for an agent
Get dashboard statistics for an agent
Get tool usage statistics for an agent
Get workflow statistics for an agent
Get performance metrics for an agent
Get user behavior statistics for an agent
Get error analysis for an agent
Get reasoning summary statistics for an agent

tags.description: Tags for categorizing the memory source

source.description: The actual source content or URL

forget_after.description: Time duration after which to forget this source

sync_frequency.description: How often to sync this source

source_id.description: The memory source ID to update

content.description: The actual content or URL to fetch

tokens.description: Number of tokens in the page content
Total number of tokens across all content

forget_after_at.description: Timestamp when the source will be forgotten

MemorySourceObject.description: Memory source object (used in list responses)

content.description: The actual content or URL to fetch

tokens.description: Number of tokens in the page content
Total number of tokens across all content

forget_after_at.description: Timestamp when the source will be forgotten

MemorySourceUpdateResponse.description: Memory source update response containing only the ID and updated fields

tags.description: Updated tags as JSON string (if changed)

source_ids.description: Filter by specific memory source IDs

top.description: Number of top results to return

results.description: Search results containing context and sources

context.description: Aggregated context from all matching sources

sources.description: List of source documents that matched the search

confidence_score.description: Overall confidence score for the search results

UpdateAgentResponse.description: Agent update response containing only the ID and updated fields

reasoning_type.description: Default reasoning type for the agent

top.description: Number of top memory results to use

ratelimit_seconds.description: Rate limit time window in seconds

no_answer_reply.description: Default reply when agent has no answer

require_login.description: Whether login is required (0 = no, 1 = yes)

memory.description: Whether memory is enabled (0 = no, 1 = yes)

hide_branding.description: Whether to hide branding (0 = no, 1 = yes)

provider_key.description: Optional API key for the AI provider

provider_host.description: Optional host URL for the AI provider

model.description: Override the default model for this request

top.description: Number of memory results to include

instruction.description: Override system instructions for this request

chat_id.description: Chat conversation ID (creates new if not provided)

reasoning_mode.description: Reasoning mode for the agent response (standard, interactive, stepwise, or react)

ChatResponse.description: Response structure varies based on reasoning_mode. Contains 'chat' object with mode-specific fields.

chat.description: Chat response data with mode-specific structure

reply.description: Agent's text response (present in all modes)

conversation_count.description: Number of conversation turns (for reasoning modes)

requiresApproval.description: Whether tool execution requires approval (interactive mode)

totalSteps.description: Total number of reasoning steps (stepwise mode)

MessageDetails.description: Detailed information about a chat message

ReasoningStep.description: A single reasoning step or cycle

model.description: AI model used for this message

reasoning_type.description: Type of reasoning used (e.g., standard, interactive, stepwise, react)

isToolExecuting.description: Whether a tool is currently executing

executionType.description: Type of execution - single tool or batch

tools.description: Array of tools to execute (for BATCH execution)

server_label.description: Human-readable label for the MCP server

headers.description: Custom headers for MCP server requests

average_execution_time.description: Average tool execution time in ms

tags.name: Memory
tags.description: Operations for managing agent memory sources

tags.name: Chat
tags.description: Operations for chatting with agents and managing conversations

tags.name: Subscribers
tags.description: Operations for managing subscribers and leads

tags.name: Tools
tags.description: Operations for managing agent tools and MCP server integrations

tags.name: Analytics
tags.description: Operations for retrieving agent statistics and analytics
